```{r setup}
library(microbenchmark)
library(ggplot2)
library(isit)
```


## is_sorted

```{r is sorted, fig.show='hold', fig.width=7, collapse=TRUE}
asc <- as.numeric(1:1e6)
desc <- as.numeric(1e6:1)

res <- microbenchmark(
  is.unsorted(asc),
  is.unsorted(-desc),
  is_ascending(asc),
  is_descending(desc)
)

knitr::kable(summary(res))
autoplot(res)
```
